title: Set Up the Killzone
body: Select mission, set up terrain and objectives, place barricades.

title: Select Kill Teams
body: Choose a faction and 1 fire team, select operatives & equipment (points).

title: Gather & Deploy
body: Determine attacker/defender, deploy operatives per mission rules.

title: Initiative Phase
body: Roll for initiative; resolve scouting if applicable.

title: Strategy Phase
body: Gain CP; resolve Strategic Ploys and mission rules.

title: Firefight Phase
body: Alternate activations; perform actions (Move, Shoot, Fight, etc.).

title: End Phase & Scoring
body: Resolve Tac Ops scoring and cleanup, check for game end.
